snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes bonobos using tablets and apps to show off their considerable language skills, how Klout decides your Internet...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes bonobos using tablets and apps to show off their considerable language skills, how Klout decides your Internet fame and a demonstration of voice searches with the latest version of Android.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Ape Language and Internet Influence
